tool.name: VLUTILS.gdoize_ms
tool.description: Build missing GDOs for the selected markers set
tool.command: gdoize_ms --loglevel=$__app__.config.vl_loglevel --logfile=${logfile} #if str($mset_label) != 'select_one' --markers-set-label=$mset_label #end if #if str($study) != 'select_one' --study-label=$study #end if #if $advanced_configuration.configuration_level == 'advanced' --host=$advanced_configuration.vl_host --user=$advanced_configuration.vl_user --passwd=$advanced_configuration.vl_passwd #end if

param.name: study
param.label: Context study
param.help: Choose from the already defined studies. See below.

options.transform_lines: [ "%s%s%s:%s" % ( l[0], self.separator, l[0], l[1][:40] ) for l in obj ]

param.name: mset_label
param.label: SNP Markers Set
param.help: Choose one of the already defined SNP Markers set.

options.transform_lines: [ "%s%s%s" % (l[1], self.separator, l[1] ) for l in obj ]

tool.help: Iterate over all genotype data samples corresponding to the given marker set; create a GDO table row for each genotpye data sample that does not already have one.
